name: DuckDuck Stop
description:
Shoot at the ducks, earn points, the game will become harder, try to survive! ;)

How to play:

Left click: shoot

Right click: Reload

You can't spam right click, there is a timer before you can reload, and this timer is indicated with a "!" symbol in the game next to the numbers of bulltes you have.

Score as many points as you can!

Enjoy ;)

Also, this is not a complete version of the game, but i still thouggt to release it
